content.text: Hey, how's your day going?
It's going pretty well, thanks for asking! I'm just working on some new projects with my wife. What about you?
My day has been a little rough, to be honest. My boyfriend broke up with me yesterday.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that! Breakups are never easy.
Yeah, they're not. I'm just trying to focus on my work and keep myself busy.
That's a good idea. And if you ever need someone to talk to, I'm always here for you.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a graphic designer.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to be a graphic designer.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be really challenging sometimes.
I bet. But I'm sure you're great at it!
Thanks, I appreciate that.
So what's your favorite music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country.
Me too! I love listening to country music because it reminds me of my family and home.
I know what you mean. It's so comforting.
So what's your favorite country artist?
I love George Strait. He's my all-time favorite.
Me too! He's amazing.
I'm so glad we have something in common.
Me too!
